metadata.name: 鈴木一世　Iseei Suzuki Solo Exhibition [alive]
metadata.description:
Issei Suzuki is an artist who produces artwork by generating information from society and conveying them through vivid colours and organic figures.  
His works radiate a strong energy field powered by abstract figures and unique colours, which have attracted many viewers.

The artist has collaborated with adidas and hosted exhibitions in Tokyo and Osaka in 2022. The successful collaboration was highly acclaimed, and he is one of the youngest artists with a bright career ahead.

This exhibition titled Alive, which is the third exhibition at roidowrksgallery, is a great opportunity to view his latest works, which represent the presence of people in society, their thoughts, and emotions. These works are a way of expression for the artist to represent his thoughts, who perceives art as a visual language.  
 
This show will leave a trace of “Being Alive” in viewers’ minds. 
<Exhibition Information>

Issei Suzki: alive

22nd April 2023 (Saturday) - 30th April 2023 (Sunday)  
*Open everyday during the exhibition  
Opening hours: 12:00 - 19:00 (only close at 18:00 on the last day of the exhibitions)  
Venue: roidworksgallery  
Yushima High Town 1F, 4-6-12 Yushima, Bunkyo-ku, Tokyo, 113-0034, Japan  
TEL： +81 (0)3-3812-4712
